preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 16 g of B using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 1 g of Pa. 
 3. Measure 2 g of Tb. 
 4. Measure 1 g of Tm. 
 5. Measure 4 g of V. 
 6. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 7. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved.
